alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, northwestern Marion and west central Putnam Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 111 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking developing strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Williston, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Melrose, Citra, Hawthorne, Rochelle, Cross Creek, Orange Springs, Newnans Lake, Micanopy, Reddick and McIntosh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam
